statements: SELECT * FROM nutrient_levels;
SELECT field_name, nitrogen_level FROM nutrient_levels WHERE potassium_level > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level >= 0.3 AND phosphorus_level < 0.2;
SELECT potassium_level, field_name FROM nutrient_levels ORDER BY potassium_level DESC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM nutrient_levels;
SELECT * FROM nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level > 5 ORDER BY potassium_level DESC, field_name ASC;
SELECT field_id, field_name FROM nutrient_levels WHERE phosphorus_level < 3 AND potassium_level > 2 ORDER BY nitrogen_level ASC;
SELECT field_name, nitrogen_level, potassium_level FROM nutrient_levels WHERE phosphorus_level BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY field_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM nutrient_levels WHERE field_name LIKE '%A%' OR field_name LIKE '%B%' ORDER BY field_id ASC;
SELECT field_id, nitrogen_level, phosphorus_level, potassium_level FROM nutrient_levels WHERE nitrogen_level < 4 AND potassium_level < 2 ORDER BY field_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM soil_analysis;
SELECT field_id, nutrient_level FROM soil_analysis;
SELECT soil_id, field_id, nutrient_level FROM soil_analysis WHERE nutrient_level > 5;
SELECT crop_name, rotation_period FROM crop_rotation;
SELECT * FROM soil_analysis WHERE field_id = 100;
SELECT soil_id, nutrient_level FROM soil_analysis WHERE nutrient_level > 5 ORDER BY soil_id DESC
SELECT * FROM soil_analysis WHERE soil_id = 3
SELECT MAX(nutrient_level) AS max_nutrient_level FROM soil_analysis
SELECT crop_name, rotation_period FROM crop_rotation WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Wheat%'
SELECT AVG(nutrient_level) AS avg_nutrient_level FROM soil_analysis
SELECT * FROM fields;
SELECT field_name, soil_nitrogen, soil_ph FROM fields WHERE soil_nitrogen > 0.5;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_ph FROM crops WHERE optimal_nitrogen < 2.0;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotations WHERE rotation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT fields.field_name, crops.crop_name FROM fields INNER JOIN crop_rotations ON fields.field_id = crop_rotations.field_id INNER JOIN crops ON crop_rotations.crop_id = crops.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM fields ORDER BY field_name DESC, soil_ph ASC;
SELECT field_id, field_name, soil_nitrogen FROM fields WHERE soil_nitrogen > 3.5;
SELECT crop_name, optimal_nitrogen FROM crops WHERE optimal_nitrogen BETWEEN 2.0 AND 4.0 ORDER BY crop_name;
SELECT rotation_id, field_id, crop_id, rotation_date FROM crop_rotations WHERE rotation_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT field_name, soil_ph FROM fields JOIN crop_rotations ON fields.field_id = crop_rotations.field_id WHERE crop_id = 3 AND soil_ph < 6.0;
SELECT * FROM crop_harvest;
SELECT farm_id, farm_name, location FROM farm_location;
SELECT field_id, soil_type, nutrient_level FROM field_data WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT crop_type, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation ORDER BY rotation_date DESC;
SELECT harvest_id, harvest_date, yield_kg FROM crop_harvest WHERE yield_kg > 1000;
SELECT * FROM field_data;
SELECT field_id, soil_type FROM field_data WHERE nutrient_level > 100;
SELECT farm_name, location FROM farm_location ORDER BY farm_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_harvest WHERE yield_kg BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT crop_type, rotation_date FROM crop_rotation WHERE rotation_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM SoilFields WHERE field_id = 1;
SELECT field_name, nutrient_level FROM SoilFields WHERE nutrient_level > 5;
SELECT rotation_name FROM CropRotations WHERE rotation_id = 3;
SELECT crop_name, nutrient_requirements FROM CropTypes WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT harvest_date, yield_kg FROM CropHarvest WHERE yield_kg < 500;
SELECT field_name, nutrient_level FROM SoilFields
SELECT * FROM CropRotations WHERE rotation_id = 3
SELECT field_id, crop_name FROM FieldCropMapping INNER JOIN CropTypes ON FieldCropMapping.crop_id = CropTypes.crop_id
SELECT SUM(yield_kg) AS total_yield FROM CropHarvest WHERE harvest_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT field_name, crop_name, harvest_date FROM FieldCropMapping INNER JOIN CropTypes ON FieldCropMapping.crop_id = CropTypes.crop_id INNER JOIN CropHarvest ON FieldCropMapping.crop_id = CropHarvest.crop_id
